channel.title: Cannot change password
channel.description:
i cannot change my moparcraft password due to the fact that the email is old and no longer in my use anymore. how can i go about getting my password back?
mopar, if ur reading this and u decide to get froggy. could ya set my password yourself and shoot me a pm telling me what it is? u can check ips too, they are both my account :P

item.title: Cannot change password
item.dc:creator: @the_hattrix the hattrix
item.description:
@the_hattrix wrote:

i never said i used it just for the site, i also said he recently changed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot change password
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

the hattrix:

The account isnt deleted. back when i was like 10 I didnt know how to create an email, so me and my old friend shaired one. That was a little over 8 years ago and my old friend moved away. i have no contact with him and the password has been changed recently so no, i have no way to get into it. if i would have known this was going to happen i would have used my own email, like i said though i was young and dumb

Site is only 5 years old.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot change password
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I had a yahoo mail account that got completely deleted because I didn’t use it. It simply let me register the account again from scratch.

I also had a BT yahoo mail account that stopped me from logging in, and had to call BT for a new password. I guess yahoo sometimes does strange shit with their accounts, especially the older ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot change password
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

No yahoo does not erase anything, not even your dmails lol. I had to recover my yahoo to get my pass back, had emails from 2 years ago.

Anyways, the process to recover your email should only take 5 mintutes at most.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot change password
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You can’t get into your email anymore at all? I don’t think yahoo actually deletes accounts.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot change password
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Change the email in your profile. A authentication email should be sent to the new email address. You should be able to change your password though within your profile somwhere.

Read full topic
